plot PCA

Source: R/tidyMS_plotting.R
plot_pca.Rd

plot PCA

plot_pca(data, config, add_txt = FALSE, plotly = FALSE)

See also

Other plotting: Contrasts_Plotter, INTERNAL_FUNCTIONS_BY_FAMILY, UpSet_interaction_missing_stats(), medpolishPlydf(), missigness_histogram(), missingness_per_condition_cumsum(), missingness_per_condition(), plot_NA_heatmap(), plot_aggregation(), plot_heatmap_cor(), plot_heatmap(), plot_hierarchies_add_quantline(), plot_hierarchies_boxplot_df(), plot_hierarchies_line_df(), plot_hierarchies_line(), plot_intensity_distribution_violin(), plot_raster(), plot_sample_correlation()

Examples




istar <- prolfqua_data('data_ionstar')$filtered()
#> Column added : nr_peptide_Id_IN_protein_Id
stopifnot(nrow(istar$data) == 25780)
config <- istar$config$clone(deep=TRUE)
analysis <- istar$data

tmp <- plot_pca(analysis, config, add_txt= TRUE)
#> Joining, by = "sampleName"

print(tmp)

tmp <- plot_pca(analysis, config, add_txt= FALSE)
#> Joining, by = "sampleName"
print(tmp)

plotly::ggplotly(tmp, tooltip = config$table$sampleName)
